title: Sci-Fi | The Day the Sky Exploded (1958) Paul Hubschmid | Colorized Movie | Subtitles

sources.title: Sci-Fi | The Day the Sky Exploded (1958) Paul Hubschmid | Colorized Movie | Subtitles
sources.description:
Terror from the Sky!
Scientists discover that a group of meteors are hurtling on a collision course with Earth, and if they hit, the planet will be destroyed.

Original title: La morte viene dallo spazio (1958) AKA: The Day the Sky Exploded / Death Comes from Outer Space

Black & White version: https://youtu.be/E5-ddFsICpQ


This film is subtitled in over 30 languages. Choose your preferred language in settings ⚙️.
Directors Paolo Heusch, Mario Bav
Writers: Virgilio Sabel, Marcello Coscia, Sandro Continenza
Stars: Paul Hubschmid, Madeleine Fischer, Fiorella Mari
Genre: Colorized, Sci-Fi


00:00:00 International headlines
00:00:28 Title credits - full movie (with subtitles)
02:05 Countdown to the historic launch of the X-Z atomic rocket with John McLaren as the pilot.
08:37 Preparing for blast-off
17:20 Solid gold with rocket fuel cocktail
25:56 The rocket veers off course, causing a rescue mission and family reunion, John is back 
32:19 Winning the wager
40:49 Astronomical emergency: Massive asteroids heading towards Earth, potential collision, hope for moon interception.
00:43:52 End of the world : Global evacuation efforts initiated to counter impending disaster from approaching meteorites
00:58:32 American solution: nuke 'em!
01:13:14 Hahaha oh Hollywood


@CultCinemaClassics
